header_text: You are new to a job, and your boss asks you to do a task. You finish it before the deadline and your boss immediately points out that you made a mistake. Your boss probably thinks you are a failure.

elements.text: In the end, you realize that your boss is prompt in giving you feedback because they are investing in you, and interested in seeing you...

elements.name: You are new to a job, and your boss asks you to do a task. You finish it before the deadline and your boss immediately points out that you made a mistake. Your boss probably thinks you are a failure._Social Situations_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
